replies.bodyText: getVerticalPlayerLookDirection better, as it's Y axis
replies.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: I assume this means rotation around the Y-axis though?

replies.bodyText: Entity has getHorizontalFacing with the same function- I think it makes sense to name them similarly?
replies.author: Gegy

replies.bodyText: To clear up any confusion: this method returns either Direction.UP or Direction.DOWN based on whichever the player is more accurately looking towards.
